values: 持有；使保持（在某位置）；怀有；持有（信念、意见）；认为；拥有；捂住；按住（受伤的身体部位等）；召开；保存；容纳；担任；抓住；拿着；（打电话时）等待；不挂断；延长；继续唱（某音符）；抱住；托住；顶住；保持不变；监禁；停下；守卫；支撑…的重量
把握；控制；影响；影响力；支配力；握力；抓握；持；把持；拿；抓；握；支撑点；支撑物；擒拿技巧；（尤指摔跤、拳击中的）擒拿法；货舱；货仓；掌握；把持力

synonym.mean: 持有；拥有；保存；拘留；约束或控制

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 持有人；所有人；固定器；（台、架等）支持物

word_mean_info__list.difference: 常和contain换用。指能够容纳或有足够的容纳量。强调包容能力。
普通用词，所涉及的物体常常是其组成部分或内容。强调包容关系。既可指具体有形的东西，也可指抽象无形的东西。
把包含因整体的性质决定的成分或结果。所包括的往往是无形的，不可触知的东西，多用作引申。
正式用词，指把某事物纳入整个之中。
书面用词，暗指一个整体包括不同部分所组成，可与include交换使用。
正工用词，指包含在整体范围以内。
普通用词，指一整体包含着各独立的部分，也指某东西包含另一东西的某一部分。
最常用词，可指任何情况下的具有，无论是物质的或精神的。
指拥有并保持财产及持有见解等，暗示不让别人拿走或占有。
较正式，指拥有或占有并能加以控制与支配，强调其归属；也指具有某种品质、才能、特点或性能等。
不及本组的possess正式，多指所属关系，强调所有权，不管所属物是否在物主手中。
指享有某种权利或长处，带有欣赏或喜爱的情感。
指长时间地保有，保存某物，防止别人占去，强调安全和感情上的依附。

word_group.brief_definition: 承受得住, 保持强壮
坚持住；等一等, 别挂电话
稍等片刻；坚持不懈；握住
抵抗, 抵挡；继续生存；维持充足状态
举办音乐会；开音乐会；举办演唱会
举行会议；召开会议；开会
开始起作用, 变得十分强大；紧握住, 不撒手；扎根

bilingual.source: And some will hold their picnics near a tribe's Corroboree.
bilingual.target: 有些人会在部落的聚会附近举行野餐。
我们将在那里举行会议。

bilingual.source: We will hold a picnic in the park.
bilingual.target: 我们将在公园举行野餐。
他们每五年举行一次会议。

bilingual.source: We will hold the meeting in March.
bilingual.target: 我们将在三月份举行会议。

bilingual.source: The company will hold a meeting next week.
bilingual.target: 公司将在下周举行会议。

bilingual.source: The city government will hold a concert.
bilingual.target: 市政府将举行一场音乐会。

bilingual.source: Every year we hold a sacrifice ceremony.
bilingual.target: 每年我们都会举行祭祀仪式。

bilingual.source: They plan to hold their wedding next month.
bilingual.target: 他们计划下个月举行婚礼。

bilingual.source: We will hold a meeting at the beginning of month.
bilingual.target: 我们将在月初举行会议。

list.abstract: hold，一个英文单词，来源于香港中英混用词汇。在台湾综艺节目《大学生了没》中，一位名叫miss lin的网友以夸张另类的造型、一口做作的英语、扭捏妖娆的姿态向大学生们介绍什么是Fashion。其极度夸张搞笑的表演震撼了所有观众，miss lin的口头禅是“整个场面我要Hold住”，导致“hold住”一词红遍网络。
《hold》是网络歌手汪苏泷演唱的的一首单曲。 2010年相继推出了《弗斯特》、《七夕情人节》、《慢慢懂》等深受欢迎的专辑 。

yingyinNormal.en: The proposal is this. In lieu of these barbaric executions, we hold a symbolic Hunger Games.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我的提议如下，与其简单粗暴地处决，不如举行一届象征性的饥饿游戏。

yingyinNormal.en: In the ancient world a truce was declared for the duration of the Olympic Games and wars and battles were put on hold.
yingyinNormal.zh: 自古已有之，奥林匹克举行期间就有停战传统，一切战争和争斗都会暂停。

yingyinNormal.en: Goodbye Geller. Now, hold on. Hold on.
yingyinNormal.zh: 再见了，盖勒。等一下…

yingyinNormal.en: Hold on to your dignity, woman.
yingyinNormal.zh: 保持尊严，妹子！

yingyinNormal.en: Hold on a sec there, Mr. Kissy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 等一下，热吻先生。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, hang on a second. Hold this.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你等一下，举着这个。

yingyinNormal.en: Hi, Charlie. Yeah, I did. Hold on.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你好，查理，我看了，你等等。

yingyinNormal.en: Honey, I'll hold your hand. Come here.
yingyinNormal.zh: 亲爱的，我来牵着你的手，来吧。

yingyinNormal.en: Hold it. It's the keys. We've got them.
yingyinNormal.zh: 停下！是车钥匙，我们拿到钥匙了。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, hold on a second. That must be Dan.
yingyinNormal.zh: 等等，一定是丹。

yingyinNormal.en: Hold on. Fill these out. Sit over there.
yingyinNormal.zh: 等等，拿去填资料，坐在那儿填。

yingyinNormal.en: Hold on, here we go! Next stop knowledge!
yingyinNormal.zh: 抓稳了,我们出发! 下一站知识海洋!

yingyinNormal.en: No, no, wait, hold on. What's the matter?
yingyinNormal.zh: 等等，别走。怎么了？

yingyinNormal.en: Now, hold on. I'm the CEO, and this is...
yingyinNormal.zh: 等一下，打住，我是CEO，而这个是...

yingyinNormal.en: The Wuxi finger hold? That's my best move.
yingyinNormal.zh: 无须铁指扣？这是我的绝招。

yingyinNormal.en: Loss makes us reevaluate what we hold dear.
yingyinNormal.zh: 失去让我们重新审视我们珍惜的一切。

yingyinNormal.en: Cheated? Hold on there, baldy. Oh, grow up.
yingyinNormal.zh: 等等，秃子。哦，得了吧。

yingyinNormal.en: Hold. What? Explain your sneeze. I'm sorry?
yingyinNormal.zh: 站住。干嘛？解释你为什么打喷嚏。什么？

yingyinNormal.en: Hold on a second. This is my friend's machine.
yingyinNormal.zh: 等等，这是我朋友用的机器。

yingyinNormal.en: It's getting even windier, Hold onto your hats.
yingyinNormal.zh: 风越来越大了。按住你们的帽子。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 拥有; 担任; 获得
抓住; 托住; 抱住
延长; 继续唱(某音符)
等待; 停下; 不要做

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 支托物；容器；持有者；占有者；小农；小佃农；纪录保持者；获奖者；冠军称号保持者
v. 拒给；不给；克制；抑制
n. 租用的土地；拥有的财产；土地租用期限；馆藏

word_family.mean: v. 抓住；拿着；托住；夹住；拘留；稳定；容纳；能装；拥有；为（人）保留；控制；防止；举行

examination_example.sentence: A different and not mutually exclusive prediction <highlight>holds</highlight> that the future will be a wasteland of a different sort.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 另一种不同且并非相互排斥的预测认为，未来将是另一种类型的荒原。

examination_example.sentence: Andy Coulson should be <highlight>held</highlight> innocent of the charge.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 安迪·库尔森应该被判为无罪。

examination_example.sentence: On the overturned provisions the majority <highlight>held</highlight> that Congress had deliberately occupied the field.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 关于被推翻的条款，大多数人认为国会故意占据了这个领域。

sense_info_list.zh: 拥有; 担任; 获得

examination_example.sentence: Shareholders who <highlight>hold</highlight> onto a company investment for at least two years can sometimes earn more voting rights in a company.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 持有公司投资至少两年的股东有时可以在公司获得更多的投票权。

examination_example.sentence: The average time for <highlight>holding</highlight> a stock has dropped from seven years to seven months in recent decades.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 近几十年来，持有一只股票的平均时间从7年下降到了7个月。

examination_example.sentence: Indeed, women <highlight>hold</highlight> only 14 per cent of positions on European corporate boards.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 事实上，欧洲公司董事会中女性仅占14%的职位。

sense_info_list.en: to keep sb / sth in a particular position; to remain the same; to keep sth at the same level, rate, speed, etc.

examination_example.sentence: Most people are not comfortable <highlight>holding</highlight> eye contact with strangers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大多数人都不愿意和陌生人保持眼神交流。

examination_example.sentence: Guilt, in other words, can help <highlight>hold</highlight> a cooperative species together.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 换句话说，内疚可以帮助维系一个合作的物种。

examination_example.sentence: The link between happiness and investment generally <highlight>held</highlight> even after accounting for these things.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 即使考虑到这些因素，幸福和投资之间的联系仍然存在。

sense_info_list.en: grasp, carry, or support with one's arms or hands
sense_info_list.zh: 抓住; 托住; 抱住

examination_example.sentence: Sixty toddlers were each introduced to an adult tester <highlight>holding</highlight> a plastic container.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 60个蹒跚学步的孩子被介绍给一个抓着塑料容器的成年测试者。

examination_example.sentence: Invite him/her to organize a team for the international innovation contest to be <highlight>held</highlight> at your university.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 邀请他/她为将在你大学举行的国际创新竞赛组织一个团队。

examination_example.sentence: Suppose your class is to <highlight>hold</highlight> a charity sale for kids in need of help.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 假设你的班级要为需要帮助的孩子举办慈善义卖。

examination_example.sentence: The BIO recently <highlight>held</highlight> a convention which included sessions to coach lawyers on the shifting landscape for patents.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 生物组织最近举行了一次会议，包括就不断变化的专利形势对律师进行培训。

sense_info_list.en: consider (someone) to be responsible or liable for a particular situation

examination_example.sentence: As "consumers" we must shop sustainably, rather than as "citizens" <highlight>hold</highlight> our governments and industries to account to push for real systemic change.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 作为“消费者”，我们必须以可持续的方式购物，而不是作为“公民”，让我们的政府和行业承担责任，推动真正的系统性变革。

examination_example.sentence: The purpose of this "clawback" rule is to <highlight>hold</highlight> bankers accountable for harmful risk-taking.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这项“追回”规则的目的是让银行家对有害的冒险行为负责。

examination_example.sentence: France's digital services tax and the American response raise questions about what the future <highlight>holds</highlight> for the international tax system.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 法国的数字服务税和美国的回应引发了人们对适用于国际税收体系的未来的质疑。

examination_example.sentence: Another surprise is that the findings <highlight>hold</highlight> true for both those with children and without, but more so for nonparents.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 另一个令人惊讶的发现是，这些发现对有孩子和没有孩子的人都适用，但对非贫困人口更是如此。

examination_example.sentence: The homework rules should be put on <highlight>hold</highlight> while the school board looks into the matter and conducts public hearings.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当学校董事会调查此事并举行公开听证会时，家庭作业规则应该暂时搁置。

examination_example.sentence: You may decide it's best to <highlight>hold</highlight> off on voicing your opinion.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你可能决定最好暂缓发表你的意见。

examination_example.sentence: His biographies were <highlight>held</highlight> up as beacons to guide the working man through his difficult life.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他的传记被奉为指路明灯，指引这位工人度过艰难的一生。

examination_example.sentence: It did so while <highlight>holding</highlight> its nose at the ethics of his conduct.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它这样做的同时，对他的行为伦理嗤之以鼻。

examination_example.sentence: Hard times may <highlight>hold</highlight> you down at what usually seems like the most inopportune time.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 艰难的时刻可能会在最不合时宜的时候压制你。

sense_info_list.en: to keep sth so that it can be used later
power or control over something or someone
the space in a ship or aircraft in which goods are carried

sense_info_list.zh: 延长; 继续唱(某音符)

sense_info_list.en: take in and have within
to keep sb's attention or interest
keep someone in a place so that they cannot leave
wait, or to stop something temporarily
sense_info_list.zh: 等待; 停下; 不要做

word_usage.usage:
hold指处于某种状态时，只能用于主动结构。
例: How long will the fine weather hold? 好天气会持续多久？

hold作动词指“认为；相信”时，可以说hold that...或hold sth. to do sth.（此句型常用于被动语态），还可以用 hold sth.+adj.
例： These vases are held to be the finest examples of Greek art. 
        这些花瓶被视为希腊艺术的最佳典范。
        Parents will be held responsible for their children's behaviour.
        父母将要对孩子的行为负责。

hold指“容纳”“拥有财产（地位、职务）”时，通常不用于进行时。
例：The plane holds about 300 passengers. 这架飞机可容纳大约300名乘客。

hold可以接形容词作表语，其用法相当于系动词。
例：The same argument does not hold good in every case. 
       同样的论点并非在所有的情况下都正确。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 拥有某属性; 保持某种状态
控制; 拥有; 担任

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 坚持住；等一等；别挂电话
抵抗；抵挡；继续生存；维持充足状态
开始起作用；变得十分强大；紧握住；不撒手；扎根

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 支托物；容器；持有者；占有者；小农；小佃农；纪录保持者；获奖者；冠军称号保持者
v. 拒给；不给；克制；抑制

word_family.mean: v. 抓住；拿着；托住；夹住；拘留；稳定；容纳；能装；拥有；为（人）保留；控制；防止；举行

sense_info_list.en: keep something, especially when it might have been lost

examination_example.sentence: So one function of the mind may be to <highlight>hold</highlight> beliefs that bring the belief-holder the greatest number of allies, protectors.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因此，头脑的一个功能可能是持有信念，这种信念会给信念持有者带来最多的盟友和保护者。

examination_example.sentence: The culture minister, Franck Riester, said religious relics saved from the cathedral were being securely <highlight>held</highlight> at the Hôtel de Ville.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 文化部长Franck Riester表示，从大教堂救出的宗教文物正被妥善安置在巴黎市政厅。

examination_example.sentence: For instance, DeWalt discovered that many contractors were <highlight>holding</highlight> on to their old tools, even if they no longer worked.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 例如，DeWalt发现许多承包商仍然保留着他们的旧工具，即使它们已不再工作。

sense_info_list.en: carry on by group action

examination_example.sentence: Ahmed Bouchfaa responded that the brand <highlight>holds</highlight> sales of old stock for staff members twice a year.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Ahmed Bouchfaa回应说，该品牌每年为员工举行两次旧货销售。

sense_info_list.en: have a particular quality; stay in the say way as before
sense_info_list.zh: 拥有某属性; 保持某种状态

examination_example.sentence: They also <highlight>hold</highlight> employees accountable for their behaviors and are genuinely committed to doing the right thing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们还要求员工对自己的行为负责，并真诚地致力于做正确的事情。

examination_example.sentence: They are <highlight>held</highlight> accountable by their employees.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们被他们的雇员追究责任。

examination_example.sentence: All these effects <highlight>held</highlight> true for measures of happiness, life satisfaction and self-esteem, with the effects stronger in the 8th and 10th-graders.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 所有这些影响对于衡量幸福感，生活满意度和自尊心都适用，在8年级和10年级的学生中更强。

sense_info_list.en: have or keep a grip on

examination_example.sentence: In his lifetime, Marconi foresaw the development of television and the fax machine, GPS, radar, and the portable hand-<highlight>held</highlight> telephone.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Marconi在有生之年预见到了电视、传真机、GPS、雷达和便携式手持电话的发展。

sense_info_list.en: have something, especially a position or money, or to control something
sense_info_list.zh: 控制; 拥有; 担任

sense_info_list.en: have or keep possession or control of

examination_example.sentence: This insight not only explains why we might <highlight>hold</highlight> our tongue at a dinner party or look the other way.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这一观点不仅解释了为什么我们会在晚宴上保持沉默或朝其他方向看。

examination_example.sentence: It is noteworthy that the findings <highlight>held</highlight> even after the researchers considered factors that could affect the link.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 值得注意的是，即使研究人员考虑了可能影响这种联系的因素，这些发现仍然成立。

examination_example.sentence: The subject of automation and its role in our economy has taken <highlight>hold</highlight> in American public discourse.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 自动化的主题及其在我们经济中的作用已经在美国公众的讨论中占据了一席之地。

sense_info_list.en: to remain strong and working effectively

examination_example.sentence: Most of the wooden roof beams have been burned, and parts of the concrete <highlight>holding</highlight> up the roof have collapsed.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大部分的木质屋顶横梁已经被烧毁，支撑屋顶的部分混凝土已经坍塌。

sense_info_list.en: power or control over something or someone
take in and have within

word_usage.usage: hold指动作时，可用于被动结构；指处于某种状态时，只能用于主动结构。
take hold of指“抓住”，比take hold (up) on常用。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指享有某种权利或长处, 带有欣赏或喜爱的情感。通常指享有声誉、权利、利益等好的东西。
指拥有并保持财产及持有见解等, 暗示不让别人拿走或占有。指拥有某些财产或头衔, 也可表示心中怀有某种看法。
正工用词, 指包含在整体范围以内。
普通用词, 所涉及的物体常常是其组成部分或内容。强调包容关系。既可指具体有形的东西, 也可指抽象无形的东西。
正式用词, 指把某事物纳入整个之中。
常和 contain 换用。指能够容纳或有足够的容纳量。强调包容能力。
普通用词, 指一整体包含着各独立的部分, 也指某东西包含另一东西的某一部分。
把包含因整体的性质决定的成分或结果。所包括的往往是无形的, 不可触知的东西, 多用作引申。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 拥有某属性; 保持某种状态
控制; 拥有; 担任

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: carry on by group action

examination_example.sentence: A school project of collecting used books was <highlight>held</highlight> last weekend.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 上周末，学校举行了一次收集旧书的活动。

examination_example.sentence: The All Energy Conference is being <highlight>held</highlight> in Glasgow.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 全能源会议正在格拉斯哥举行。

examination_example.sentence: The bypass <highlight>held</highlight> a new era in motor travel and was greeted with excitement and optimism.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不经过市中心的旁路开创了汽车旅行的新时代，人们兴奋不已、情绪乐观。

sense_info_list.en: have a particular quality; stay in the say way as before
sense_info_list.zh: 拥有某属性; 保持某种状态

examination_example.sentence: The door was <highlight>held</highlight> for 15 to 20 people at a time at each location.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 每个地方的门都可以同时容纳15到20人通过。

examination_example.sentence: They <highlight>held</highlight> doors open for people at various places.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们在不同的地方为人们敞开大门。

examination_example.sentence: Options are more valuable the longer they can be <highlight>held</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 所做的选择持续时间越久，其价值就愈加重要。

sense_info_list.en: keep something; especially when it might have been lost

examination_example.sentence: Professor O'Keefe established in earlier studies that people <highlight>hold</highlight> different beliefs about the nature of interest.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 奥基夫教授在早期的研究中指出，人们对兴趣的本质持有不同的信念。

examination_example.sentence: The ability to be aware that a nightmare is happening and possibly even control it without waking up—may <highlight>hold</highlight> the answer.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 意识到噩梦正在发生，甚至可能在不醒来的情况下控制它的能力——可能就是答案。

examination_example.sentence: When they <highlight>held</highlight> more of a growth mindset of intelligence, they showed lower levels of stress hormones.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当他们保持智力增长时，他们表现出较低的压力荷尔蒙水平。

sense_info_list.en: have or keep a grip on

examination_example.sentence: In contrast, in certain Arabian, and Asian countries, men can publicly <highlight>hold</highlight> hands or show physical affection as signs of brotherhood or friendship.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 相比之下，在某些阿拉伯和亚洲国家，男人可以在公共场合牵手或表现出身体上的喜爱，以此作为兄弟情谊或友谊的标志。

examination_example.sentence: "People are cheering and <highlight>holding</highlight> their carts in the air," says Giovanni Giorgio, who helped organize the march with a grass-roots organization called Generazione.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Giovanni Giorgio 说：“人们欢呼雀跃，将手推车举向空中。”他与一个名为 Generazione 的基层组织一起组织了游行。

sense_info_list.en: have something; especially a position or money; or to control something
sense_info_list.zh: 控制; 拥有; 担任

examination_example.sentence: While 53% believe men will continue to <highlight>hold</highlight> more top executive positions in business in the future, 44% say it's only a matter of time before as many women are in top executive positions as men.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 虽然53%的人认为未来男性将继续在企业中担任更多的高层管理职位，但44%的人表示，女性与男性高管数量齐平只是时间问题。

sense_info_list.en: have or keep possession or control of
take in and have within

word_usage.usage: hold指动作时，可用于被动结构；指处于某种状态时，只能用于主动结构。
take hold of指“抓住”，比take hold (up) on常用。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指享有某种权利或长处，带有欣赏或喜爱的情感。通常指享有声誉、权利、利益等好的东西。
指拥有并保持财产及持有见解等，暗示不让别人拿走或占有。指拥有某些财产或头衔，也可表示心中怀有某种看法。
正工用词，指包含在整体范围以内。
普通用词，所涉及的物体常常是其组成部分或内容。强调包容关系。既可指具体有形的东西，也可指抽象无形的东西。
正式用词，指把某事物纳入整个之中。
常和 contain 换用。指能够容纳或有足够的容纳量。强调包容能力。
普通用词，指一整体包含着各独立的部分，也指某东西包含另一东西的某一部分。
把包含因整体的性质决定的成分或结果。所包括的往往是无形的，不可触知的东西，多用作引申。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 畏惧；犹豫；抑制；抑止；隐瞒

sense_info_list.en: to have something such as a meeting or an election

examination_example.sentence: Staff members <highlight>hold</highlight> plenty of bar events for guests like free shots, bar crawls and karaoke.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 工作人员为客人举办大量的酒吧活动，如免费拍照、串酒吧和卡拉OK。

examination_example.sentence: Take some time to check out the buildings where your classes will be <highlight>held</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 花点时间去看看你在哪里上课。

examination_example.sentence: I <highlight>held</highlight> presentations at schools to teach kids about plastic waste.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我在学校举办讲座，教孩子们关于塑料垃圾的知识。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Hold</highlight> a master's degree in science
examination_example.sentence_trans: 持有工科硕士学位

examination_example.sentence: Art generates money and <highlight>holds</highlight> significant emotional and cultural value within communities.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 艺术能够变现，并能在社区中具有重要的情感和文化价值。

sense_info_list.en: to contain or be able to contain something

examination_example.sentence: Pack a bag, cut a cake, guess which juice container <highlight>holds</highlight> the most liquid, and much more.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 打包，切蛋糕，猜测哪个果汁容器装的液体最多，等等。

examination_example.sentence: How many people could the Circus Maximus <highlight>hold</highlight>?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大竞技场能容纳多少人？

sense_info_list.en: have or keep a grip on

examination_example.sentence: Mastering one thing to the exclusion (排除) of others can <highlight>hold back</highlight> your true spirit.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 掌握一件事而排除他人会抑制你真正的精神。

examination_example.sentence: Thus, it may be worth bringing up issues with your friends, family members, or classmates rather than <highlight>holding</highlight> them back.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因此，向你的朋友、家人和同学提出问题比隐瞒更加值得。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 拥有某属性; 使保持
拥有; 获得; 担任
(hold back)阻止; 抑制; 阻挡

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 租用的土地；拥有的财产；土地租用期限；馆藏

word_family.mean: v. 抓住；拿着；托住；夹住；拘留；稳定；容纳；能装；拥有；为（人）保留；控制；防止；举行

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 举起；支撑；保持良好状况；耽搁
稍等片刻；坚持住；等一等；别挂电话；握住
稍等片刻；坚持不懈；握住
伸出；抵抗；抵挡；继续生存；隐瞒；坚持抵抗
举办音乐会；开音乐会；举办演唱会
举行会议；召开会议；开会

sense_info_list.en: carry on by group action

examination_example.sentence: A classical concert will be <highlight>held</highlight> online next month.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 下个月，一场古典音乐会将在网上举行。

examination_example.sentence: During the science week, open days will be <highlight>held</highlight> to let people experience how science and technology have improved our live.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在科学周期间，将举行开放日，让人们体验科学技术如何改善我们的生活。

examination_example.sentence: The 2022 Winter Olympic Games will be <highlight>held</highlight> in China.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 2022年冬季奥运会将在中国举行。

sense_info_list.en: have or keep a grip on

examination_example.sentence: I tried to <highlight>hold</highlight> my cat in my arms, but it ran away from me in fear.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我试图把我的猫抱在怀里，但它吓得从我身边跑开了。

examination_example.sentence: The lady was smiling and <highlight>holding</highlight> a few coins in her hand．
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这位女士微笑着，手里拿着几枚硬币。

examination_example.sentence: I <highlight>held</highlight> the flower up to my nose and took a deep breath.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我把花举到鼻子前，深深地吸了一口气。

sense_info_list.en: have a particular quality; stay in the same way as before
sense_info_list.zh: 拥有某属性; 使保持

examination_example.sentence: So I told myself I would also make a difference if I could <highlight>hold</highlight> on for a longer time.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 所以我告诉自己，如果我能坚持更长时间，我也会有所作为。

examination_example.sentence: Whenever I feel I might be falling, I tell myself to <highlight>hold</highlight> on until I find my moment.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 每当我觉得自己要被击垮时，我就告诉自己要坚持下去，直到找到属于自己的那一刻。

examination_example.sentence: Perhaps it <highlight>holds</highlight> true for some cases, but often it does not.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 也许在某些情况下它是正确的，但通常它并不是。

sense_info_list.en: have something, especially a position or money, or to control something
sense_info_list.zh: 拥有; 获得; 担任

examination_example.sentence: He <highlight>held</highlight> that job for four years and then worked his way up to being a school safety monitor.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他拥有那份工作四年，然后一步步晋升为学校安全监督员。

examination_example.sentence: Each of us <highlight>holds</highlight> a special place in the world．
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们每个人都在世界上占有特殊的位置。

examination_example.sentence: Do Bats <highlight>Hold</highlight> the Secret to Long Life?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 蝙蝠持有长寿的秘诀吗？

sense_info_list.en: take in and have within

examination_example.sentence: The two hospitals are big enough to <highlight>hold</highlight> 1, 600 beds.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这两家医院足够大，能容纳1600张床位。

examination_example.sentence: There were not enough classrooms to <highlight>hold</highlight> all the students．
examination_example.sentence_trans: 没有足够的教室容纳所有的学生。

examination_example.sentence: Reading is like <highlight>holding</highlight> water with the basket.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 读书就像用篮子盛水。

sense_info_list.en: have or keep possession or control of

examination_example.sentence: Mobile technology means we can <highlight>hold</highlight> the world in our hands.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 移动技术意味着我们可以掌控世界。

examination_example.sentence: Mom said as she <highlight>held</highlight> back her tears.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 妈妈一边说一边忍住眼泪。

examination_example.sentence: In our life, we may sometimes feel like there are certain things that are <highlight>holding</highlight> us back and stopping us from growing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在我们的生活中，我们有时可能会觉得有某些东西在阻碍我们，阻止我们成长。

examination_example.sentence: Whatever kind of values you <highlight>hold</highlight>, such personalities (品格) are necessary for growth.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 无论你持有什么样的价值观，这样的个性对成长都是必要的。

examination_example.sentence: That is a foolish (愚蠢的) idea which is <highlight>held</highlight> by people who have no imagination．
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这是一个愚蠢的想法，是那些没有想象力的人所持有的。

examination_example.sentence: They were quite surprised and all reached the hall <highlight>holding</highlight> various thoughts.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们非常惊讶，都抱着各种想法来到大厅。

sense_info_list.en: keep someone in a place so that they cannot leave

examination_example.sentence: A man walking through an elephant camp was surprised to find that the elephants weren't being kept in cages or <highlight>held</highlight> by chains.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一名男子走过大象营地时惊讶地发现，这些大象既没有被关在笼子里，也没有被铁链拴着。

examination_example.sentence: When they were very young and much smaller, we used the same size of rope to tie them, and at that age, it was enough to <highlight>hold</highlight> them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当他们很小很小的时候，我们用同样大小的绳子绑住它们，对那个年龄来说，控制住它们足够了。

examination_example.sentence: As a baby, you reached for me whenever you were hungry or just needed to be <highlight>held</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当你还是个婴儿的时候，每当你饿了或者是需要被人抱着的时候，就会伸手来找我。

examination_example.sentence: No, it is because it can <highlight>hold</highlight> the head of a friend or loved one when they cry.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不，这是因为它可以在朋友或亲人哭泣时抱住他们的头。

examination_example.sentence: My mother just <highlight>held</highlight> me while I sobbed for hours.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在我哭哭啼啼的几个小时里，妈妈只是抱着我。

examination_example.sentence: The little tree <highlight>held</highlight> out its tiny leaves.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 小树伸出了它的嫩叶。

examination_example.sentence: The frog let her <highlight>hold</highlight> out her fishing net to the sunshine and he would sing a magic song.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 青蛙让她向阳光伸出渔网，他就会唱出一首神奇的歌。

sense_info_list.en: wait, or to stop something temporarily

examination_example.sentence: Frank <highlight>held</highlight> his breath under the water to search for his ring in the swimming pool.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 弗兰克在水下屏住呼吸，在游泳池里寻找他的戒指。

examination_example.sentence: Mark <highlight>held</highlight> his breath and stared at the barber's face in the mirror.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 马克屏住呼吸，盯着镜子里理发师的脸。

sense_info_list.zh: (hold back)阻止; 抑制; 阻挡

examination_example.sentence: We may sometimes feel like there are certain things that are <highlight>holding</highlight> us back and stopping us from growing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们有时可能会觉得有某些事情在阻碍，阻止我们成长。

examination_example.sentence: Wastewater treatment plants <highlight>hold</highlight> back 83 to 99 percent of them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 废水处理厂处理了83%至99%的废水。

examination_example.sentence: For example, buildings, <highlight>holds</highlight>, public transport and other public places are becoming more wheelchair friendly.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 例如，建筑、货仓、公共交通和其他公共场所变得更加方便轮（通行）。

word_usage.usage: hold指动作时，可用于被动结构；指处于某种状态时，只能用于主动结构。
take hold of指“抓住”，比take hold (up) on常用。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 普通用词，指一整体包含着各独立的部分，也指某东西包含另一东西的某一部分。
常和contain换用，指能够容纳或有足够的容纳量，强调包容能力。
最常用词，可指任何情况下的具有，无论是物质的或精神的。
指拥有并保持财产及持有见解等，暗示不让别人拿走或占有。
指具有所有权，尤指因购买、接受赠予等而合法地拥有。
指长时间地保有，保存某物，防止别人占去，强调安全和感情上的依附。
指享有某种权利或长处，带有欣赏或喜爱的情感。
